reviews.title: fatally flawed
reviews.comment: Nice set of features, good sounds too, but if I was wanting jerky tempo I\'d get a real drummer... please fix, this software has so much potential and yet it doesn\'t do the one major thing you want from a drum machine, it doesn\'t stay in time...
reviews.author: bobbi iddod

reviews.title: BEAT DRUM APP EVER!!
reviews.comment: For those who say it keeps unsteady beat, its proberbly your hardware, you may have a slow processor or outdated phone or tab
reviews.author: Shane Adams

reviews.title: Good but needs work for non recreational work
reviews.comment: Its a great app for messing around, but the timing isn\'t consistent when sequencing. Fix this and it\'ll be a 5 star. Otherwise pretty useless to play anything to as the tempo changes erratically
reviews.author: Joseph Butler

reviews.title: Horrid Timing
reviews.comment: The purpose of drums is to keep time. The sequencer in this app has absolutely no sense of timing and is completely useless. That being said, every other aspect of this app is great. It would be THE one-stop-shop for beat making on the Android platform if the sequencer would actually keep time. Fix that and this app deserves no less than 4 stars. I will not uninstall the app because I hope to see a working sequencer in the next update. :-)
reviews.author: William Masopust

reviews.title: Would be perfect if...
reviews.comment: the tempo wasn\'t so god awefully loose in the sequencer. Also, effects racks would be stellar
reviews.author: Tyler Gates

reviews.title: Great concept but...
reviews.comment: The sequencer doesn\'t quantize your beats - the timing is well off. And I\'m running on a Galaxy S4, so it\'s not a processor issue.   I think this bug is a real shame as the app is well thought out and I would happily pay for an ad free version but only if the beat grids work effectively and you had the option to add swing templates.   Come on developer, sort it out!
reviews.author: Andrew Graham

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This drum machine is awesome. ... has an easy to use interface and had me making beats in no time!
reviews.author: james cip

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Cant even load up the tracks i was working on after initial save. Keeps loading the first and imperfect track. Angry. So angry. I want my six hours of life back.
reviews.author: Nate Tg

reviews.title: Very nice apps
reviews.comment: Excellent
reviews.author: Antesh Sharma

reviews.title: Uneven beats
reviews.comment: The sequencer\'s uneven beat playback makes it unusable.
reviews.author: Mark Feeney

reviews.title: Dual core phone bad timing
reviews.comment: Dual core phone, with zero apps running in background,  speed boosted, Android assisted, Samsung Galzxy S2 with class10 memory upgrade. the iphones ad ipads have it for timing abd latency, end of. Electrum is best on droid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MicromaxA44
reviews.comment: It\'s good. But pls add help bottom
reviews.author: tanmoy jana

reviews.title: Wish it had higher bpms
reviews.comment: Overall this is the coolest drum machine I\'ve seen out there that is also free. Sometimes the app quits on me but I\'ve learned to save constantly and everything seems to work out in the end. I would also love if it allowed bpms higher than 250 but that will probably come with the next update hopefully
reviews.author: Jerry S

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very good
reviews.author: Om Siwakoti

reviews.title: No good!
reviews.comment: I am using Samsung Galaxy SII. This app does not keep good time at all. What use is a drum machine that can\'t keep time?
reviews.author: H\303\266r\303\260ur Stef\303\241nsson

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: Needs more sounds
reviews.author: Anastasia Hansberry

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Still trying to figure out how to setup use the WiFi section. I need guide line. I have a router, a WiFi network and my Sony xperia z tablet. I have downloaded the dsmi WiFi too. So what are the steps because my pc cant dictect any midi from the WiFi. The OS in my studio is windows xp and fedora18(linux)

reviews.title: its good
reviews.comment: i likit
reviews.author: lorenzo patt

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Badass drum machine

reviews.title: Could use more sounds
reviews.comment: App is pretty simple, could use more sounds for users that want to make more complex beats on the go.
reviews.author: Alfredo Abud
